
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/MineLSG/p/18624020" title="发布于 2024-12-23 14:52">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">我的世界服务端插件安装 AuthMe用户登录插件安装</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-pair-s md-expand"><code>Minecraft服务端</code><span class="md-plain">插件安装-<span class="md-pair-s"><code>AuthMe</code><span class="md-plain">用户登录插件安装</span></span></span></span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">需要准备<span class="md-pair-s"><code>AuthMe</code><span class="md-plain">插件</span></span></span></p>
<ul class="ul-list" data-mark="-">
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-pair-s"><code>AuthMe-5.6.0.jar</code><span class="md-plain">用户登录插件</span></span></p>
<ul class="ul-list" data-mark="-">
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">例如使用<span class="md-pair-s"><code>/register &lt;密码&gt; &lt;确认密码&gt;</code><span class="md-plain">进行注册，使用<span class="md-pair-s"><code>/login &lt;密码&gt;</code><span class="md-plain">进登录</span></span></span></span></span></p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1607377/202412/1607377-20241223144636517-99240138.png" alt="" width="588" height="266" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">AuthMe插件</span></h3>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-tab"> <span class="md-plain">AuthMe 是一个广泛用于 Minecraft 服务器的插件，主要用于账户验证和注册流程。它帮助管理员管理玩家登录、注册及验证过程，确保每个玩家都有唯一的账户，并且可以安全地访问服务器。以下是 AuthMe 插件的一些主要功能：</span></span></p>
<ol class="ol-list" start="">
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-pair-s"><strong>注册/登录</strong><span class="md-plain">：玩家首次加入服务器时需要创建账户（提供密码），之后每次连接都需要使用该账户登录。</span></span></p>
</li>
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-pair-s "><strong>强制验证</strong><span class="md-plain">：可以设置为玩家在未验证身份之前无法与游戏世界互动，防止未经授权的访问。</span></span></p>
</li>
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-pair-s "><strong>密码保护</strong><span class="md-plain">：支持玩家通过设置密码来保护自己的账户，增强安全性。</span></span></p>
</li>
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-pair-s "><strong>数据库支持</strong><span class="md-plain">：支持不同的数据库类型（如 MySQL, SQLite）来存储用户信息，确保数据的安全性和持久性。</span></span></p>
</li>
<li class="md-list-item">
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">提供了插件开发接口(API)，使得其他插件能够与AuthMe交互，扩展其功能。</span></p>
</li>
</ol>
<h4 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">一、插件安装</span></h4>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-tab"> <span class="md-plain">回到服务文件的根目录，打开<span class="md-pair-s"><code>plugins</code><span class="md-plain">文件夹，将<span class="md-pair-s"><code>AuthMe-5.6.0.jar</code><span class="md-plain">文件放入，如果服务是开启状态需要手动输入命令<span class="md-pair-s"><code>stop</code><span class="md-plain">后双击<span class="md-pair-s"><code>start.bat</code><span class="md-plain">再次启动该服务。</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1607377/202412/1607377-20241223144704849-734887702.png" alt="" width="485" height="573" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1607377/202412/1607377-20241223144722083-1510417343.png" alt="" width="485" height="305" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">再次启动服务后提示该插件缺少<span class="md-pair-s"><code>GeoLite2-Country.mmdb</code><span class="md-plain">文件</span></span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1607377/202412/1607377-20241223144757577-220119658.png" alt="" width="487" height="283" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">将外部的<span class="md-pair-s"><code>GeoLite2-Country.mmdb</code><span class="md-plain">文件复制到<span class="md-pair-s"><code>plugins</code><span class="md-plain">下的<span class="md-pair-s"><code>AuthMe</code><span class="md-plain">目录<span class="md-pair-s"><code>重启服务</code><span class="md-plain">即可。</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1607377/202412/1607377-20241223144822898-564474420.png" alt="" width="535" height="352" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1607377/202412/1607377-20241223144838191-557235229.png" alt="" width="533" height="281" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h4 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">二、数据库配置和语言配置</span></h4>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-tab"> <span class="md-plain">首先使用<span class="md-pair-s"><code>stop</code><span class="md-plain">命令关闭服务，进入到<span class="md-pair-s"><code>plugins</code><span class="md-plain">目录下的<span class="md-pair-s"><code>AuthMe</code><span class="md-plain">目录，使用任意一款编辑器打开<span class="md-pair-s"><code>config.yml</code><span class="md-plain">配置文件，如果使用MySQL数据库，请根据框起来的选项进行配置。该插件相关配置都在<span class="md-pair-s"><code>config.yml</code><span class="md-plain">配置文件中，需要高级定制请仔细阅读插件说明进行配置。</span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1607377/202412/1607377-20241223144921691-266029061.png" alt="" width="599" height="815" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">修改为<span class="md-pair-s"><code>zhcn</code><span class="md-plain">简体中文</span></span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1607377/202412/1607377-20241223144939087-1343112631.png" alt="" width="600" height="378" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h4 class="md-end-block md-heading"><span class="md-plain">三、结果验证</span></h4>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">配置完毕数据库后启动服务，会自动在指定的库中创建数据表，表名称可在配置文件中自定义，本教程自定义的表名称为<span class="md-pair-s"><code>player_user</code></span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1607377/202412/1607377-20241223145022131-1901443765.png" alt="" width="569" height="305" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">打开<span class="md-pair-s"><code>Minecraft 1.20.1</code><span class="md-plain"> 进入服务器后可看到下方提示，使用<span class="md-pair-s"><code>/register &lt;密码&gt; &lt;确认密码&gt;</code><span class="md-plain">进行注册</span></span></span></span></span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1607377/202412/1607377-20241223145040739-883695559.png" alt="" width="627" height="854" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1607377/202412/1607377-20241223145055676-1147146466.png" alt="" width="628" height="411" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1607377/202412/1607377-20241223145147956-1506484972.png" alt="" width="632" height="447" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p"><span class="md-plain">回到数据库中可见当前注册成功用户</span></p>
<p class="md-end-block md-p">&nbsp;</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1607377/202412/1607377-20241223145209562-768156747.png" alt="" width="626" height="814" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div>
<div class="clear"></div>
